categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Miss Scowlface" was a female pilot who served in the New Republic during the Galactic Civil War in 5 ABY. She and another pilot known as "Mister Browscar" picked a quarrel with the former Imperial Sinjir Rath Velus. Though Sinjir left at the urging of his partner Conder Kyl, Sinjir later return to the cantina and took revenge on the two pilots; knocking "Browscar" unconscious and breaking "Scowlface"'s nose.
